channel.title: issue on HowIsJT
channel.description: Recent content in issue on HowIsJT

item.title: 13. The Sandstorm
item.description: Exterior work is far easier than interior, but there is still an awful lot of sanding… Ensuring the plywood and joints are smooth before proceeding with epoxy and fiberglass sheathing is laborious

item.title: 6. Rain and Horses
item.description: The “big wait” is what much of 2021 turned into. Spring 2021 brought lots of rain to south Louisiana.
